title: 'Stupid or Evil!' CCP curses in anxiety, limiting the flee of middle class/$3.28B flow out in 1 week
description:
#Chinainsights#Shanghai#Chinanews
On October 21, 2023, after China's stock market experienced a continuous decline, the Shanghai Stock Exchange fell below 3,000 points, and the outflow of foreign funds netted 24 billion, or US$3.28 billion, in one week. It’s clear to all sectors that the current outflow of foreign capital from China is accelerating at an alarming rate. 
So, has there been a massive withdrawal of foreign capital? What is the actual situation? Shanghai has always represented a cosmopolitan city in China and a gathering place for foreign investment. Let's take a look at the latest situation in Shanghai. 

Have questions? Do you have something to share with us about China? We want to hear from you!
